TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit AggregateException extends System.Exception

summary.span: 表示在应用程序执行过程中发生的一个或多个错误。

span.span: Represents one or more errors that occur during application execution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于将多个故障合并到单个可引发的异常对象。 is used to consolidate multiple failures into a single, throwable exception object. 中广泛使用它[任务并行库 (TPL)](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-parallel-library-tpl.md)并[并行 LINQ (PLINQ)](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/parallel-linq-plinq.md)。It is used extensively in the [Task Parallel Library (TPL)](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/task-parallel-library-tpl.md) and [Parallel LINQ (PLINQ)](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/parallel-linq-plinq.md). 有关其他信息，请参阅[聚合异常](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=259617).NET 相关问题博客中的条目。For additional information, see the [Aggregating Exceptions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=259617) entry in the .NET Matters blog. 有关示例，请参阅[NIB： 如何： 处理由任务引发的异常](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6c47ec8-9de9-4880-beb3-ff19ae51565d)并[如何： 处理 PLINQ 查询中的异常](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-handle-exceptions-in-a-plinq-query.md)。For an example, see [NIB: How to: Handle Exceptions Thrown by Tasks](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6c47ec8-9de9-4880-beb3-ff19ae51565d) and [How to: Handle Exceptions in a PLINQ Query](~/docs/standard/parallel-programming/how-to-handle-exceptions-in-a-plinq-query.md). ## Examples 下面的示例捕获异常并调用方法来处理它包含每个异常。The following example catches the exception and calls the method to handle each exception it contains. 编译和运行该示例的第一个`task1`变量应导致对象，其中包含异常。Compiling and running the example with the first `task1` variable should result in an object that contains an exception. 注释掉此行，取消注释第二个`task1`变量，以及编译并运行示例将生成对象，其中包含异常。Commenting out that line, uncommenting the second `task1` variable, and compiling and running the example produces an object that contains an exception. [!code-csharp[System.AggregateException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.aggregateexception.class/cs/exception1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.AggregateException.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.aggregateexception.class/vb/exception1.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 所有公共和受保护成员是线程安全的可能从多个线程同时使用。

span.span: All public and protected members of are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数初始化属性为系统提供的错误进行描述，如的消息的新实例"System.AggregateException： 发生了一个或多个错误。"This constructor initializes the property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "System.AggregateException: One or more errors occurred." 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。This message takes into account the current system culture. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`。`null`.| ||本地化的错误消息字符串。The localized error message string.|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the property. 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 。The property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor. 下表显示 的实例的初始属性值。The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of . |PropertyProperty|“值”Value| |--------------|-----------| ||`null`。`null`.| ||`message` 中指定的错误消息字符串。The error message string specified in `message`.|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.AggregateException Flatten() cil managed

summary.span: 将 实例平展入单个新实例。

span.span: Flattens an instances into a single, new instance.
A new, flattened .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果某个任务需要附加的子任务引发异常，该异常包装在异常传播到父任务，该异常包装在其自身之前异常之前将其传播回调用线程。If a task has an attached child task that throws an exception, that exception is wrapped in an exception before it is propagated to the parent task, which wraps that exception in its own exception before it propagates it back to the calling thread. 在这种情况下，的属性由捕获的异常， ，或方法包含一个或多个实例，非原始异常，导致错误。In such cases, the property of the exception that is caught by the , , or method contains one or more instances, not the original exceptions that caused the fault. 若要避免必须循环访问嵌套异常，可以使用方法来删除所有嵌套异常，以便属性所返回的对象包含原始异常。To avoid having to iterate over nested exceptions, you can use the method to remove all the nested exceptions, so that the property of the returned object contains the original exceptions. 此方法以递归方式将平展的所有实例是当前的内部异常的异常实例。This method recursively flattens all instances of exceptions that are inner exceptions of the current instance . 在新返回的内部异常是异常树中的所有内部异常的并集的根节点的当前实例。The inner exceptions returned in the new are the union of all the inner exceptions from exception tree rooted at the current instance. ## Examples 在下面的示例中，嵌套 实例已经平展，并且仅在一个循环中处理。In the following example, nested instances are flattened and handled in just one loop. [!code-csharp[TPL_Exceptions#22](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/cs/flatten2.cs#22)] [!code-vb[TPL_Exceptions#22](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/vb/flatten2.vb#22)] 还可以使用 方法，通过多个任务在一个 实例中抛出的多个 实例重新抛出内部异常，如下面的示例所示。You can also use the method to rethrow the inner exceptions from multiple instances thrown by multiple tasks in a single instance, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[TPL_Exceptions#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/cs/taskexceptions2.cs#13)] [!code-vb[TPL_Exceptions#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/vb/taskexceptions2.vb#13)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Handle(class System.Func`2<class System.Exception, bool> predicate) cil managed
Public Sub Handle (predicate As Func(Of Exception, Boolean))

param.name: predicate
param.span: 每个异常要执行的谓词。

span.span: The predicate to execute for each exception.

param.span: 该谓词作为要处理的 的参数并返回一个布尔值以指示是否处理了该异常。

span.span: The predicate accepts as an argument the to be processed and returns a Boolean to indicate whether the exception was handled.

summary.span: 在每个由此 包含的 上调用处理程序。

span.span: Invokes a handler on each contained by this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每次调用`predicate`，则返回 true 或 false 以指示是否已得到处理。Each invocation of the `predicate` returns true or false to indicate whether the was handled. 在所有调用后的任何异常未得到处理，如果所有未经处理的异常将会放入一个新将引发。After all invocations, if any exceptions went unhandled, all unhandled exceptions will be put into a new which will be thrown. 否则为方法仅返回。Otherwise, the method simply returns. 如果任何调用`predicate`引发异常，它将暂停处理更多的异常，并立即传播引发的异常-是。If any invocations of the `predicate` throws an exception, it will halt the processing of any more exceptions and immediately propagate the thrown exception as-is. ## Examples 通常，异常处理程序可捕获异常使用`foreach`循环 （在 C# 中) 或`For Each`循环 (Visual Basic 中），以处理每个异常中的其集合。Ordinarily, an exception handler that catches an exception uses a `foreach` loop (in C#) or `For Each` loop (in Visual Basic) to handle each exception in its collection. 相反，下面的示例使用方法以处理每个异常，并不是重新引发的唯一例外`CustomException`实例。Instead, the following example uses the method to handle each exception, and only re-throws exceptions that are not `CustomException` instances. [!code-csharp[TPL_Exceptions#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/cs/handlemethod2.cs#16)] [!code-vb[TPL_Exceptions#16](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/vb/handlemethod2.vb#16)] 下面是使用的更完整示例方法以提供特殊处理的枚举文件时。The following is a more complete example that uses the method to provide special handling for an when enumerating files. [!code-csharp[TPL_Exceptions#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/cs/taskexceptions.cs#12)] [!code-vb[TPL_Exceptions#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Misc/tpl_exceptions/vb/taskexceptions.vb#12)]
